title: Matt Hancock – 2016 Speech on the Creative Industries
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Matt Hancock, the Minister for Digital and Culture, on 9 September 2016.
content:
This summer in Rio, Team GB had the whole world talking when we beat most of them to second place in the Olympics.
